text:
Location: Croatia, Zagreb Remote: yes Willing to relocate: yes Technologies: PHP, SQL, MySQL, Python, Javascript, Git, Ansible, Linux, AWS, REST, Nginx CV: Please email Email: darijo.milicevic@gmail.com

I'm a full stack developer (2+ years) with linux devops experience. My last position was a mix of programming, devops, system integration and open source business software (CRM, DMS). Fluent in English and Croatian. I'm looking for a more back-end/data oriented position.
